Linux Solaris Sun Microsystems workstations and servers Maintained integrated systems performance while conducting maintenance and backups as directed by the senior network engineer Mitigated a critical to precise analysis and decision making Created alternative data communication networks architecture to reroute sensitive and classified information Directed team members in efforts to
